message: Take it or leave it, Bob!
You're getting closer, Bob, but I'm still in the driver's seat!
You're running out of time, Bob, and I'm getting greedy!
You're getting desperate, Bob, and I'm taking advantage!
You're almost out of time, Bob, and I'm not budging!
You're running out of time, Bob, and I'm taking the last crumbs!
This is it, Alice. Last chance. Take it or leave it.
